text:
Please take the following action

1. Update to latest nightly
2. Install BCEL jar into ANT_HOME/lib
3. set dependency="full" in the ejbjar task
4. Check out the doco. 

This should add in all the classes required by the jar (apart from any
dynamically loaded classes)
